resources.string: Using this app and its features requires access to your installed apps inventory which is collected and stored locally so you can select and save them as favourites.\n\nDon\'t worry we will never access any of your data usage.

Your presence in this app is special, as the developer personally invited you. Your insights are highly valued, and we appreciate your contribution.
For optimal One Swipe performance, stick to your device\'s default bottom navigation. It enhances accuracy and won\'t disrupt system back swipes.
Enable our Accessibility Service for enhanced navigation. This service monitors your screen, allowing One Swipe to trigger auto-scroll when needed. We value your privacy and do not collect any data.
If you\'re having issues with swipes, you can reduce, or increase its sensitivity based on your preference
